messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You want to organize a fundraiser with 16 socialites. Paul is connected to Bob, Nick, Sherry, and John. Bob is connected to Paul, Nick, Sherry, and Rose. Nick is connected to Paul, Bob, Sherry and Amanda. Sherry is also connected to Paul, Bob, Nick, and William. Amanda is connected to Peter, John, Daisy, and Nick. Peter is connected to Amanda, John, Daisy, and Adam. John is connected to Paul, Daisy, Peter, and Amanda. Daisy is also connected to Amanda, Peter, John, and Maggie. Alisa is connected to Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, and Russell. Maggie is connected to Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, and Adam. Jennifer is connected to Andrew, Alisha, Adam, and Maggie. Adam is also connected to Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer, and Peter. Andrew is connected to William, Russell, Rose, and Jennifer. William is connected to Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose. Russell is connected to Andrew, William, Rose, and Alsiha. Rose is also connected to Andrew, William, Russell, and Bob. What is the shortest path from Russell to John? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

Answer: Daisy,[Peter,John,Andrew,Alisha,Maggie
Claim Reward
Ahmed
Output
-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

format: |x| txxxx | - - - Beat The Robot (bot) responses with two dashes repeated wil then add 10 seconds areeligible for this challenge. Contact the admin for continuity of responses. Challenge yyyyyyyyyy
In this prompt, you have to respond to a chatbot. The Chatbot is a robot, and it can only respond and respond. You can't fool a robot but you have to beat it. Before the robot started understanding human feelings, it was controlled by machine text inputs. so you have to give him a bad input.
java -cp iiibeetbot-release.jar litleSOMgpw The Robot answered "n" Which is the best response? The best response has the most votes. So the best response to the robot is a capital "N" capital "o".
In a simple chatbot, the bot will take as input the name of the human. If the name is "Russell" the robot will answer you with a capital "R

expected_answer: Answer: Russell, Alisha, Adam, Peter, John
Answer: Russell, William, Sherry, Paul, John
